00001 #ifndef _GAME_CELL_STORE_H
00002 #define _GAME_CELL_STORE_H
00003 
00004 /*
00005   Cell storage.
00006 
00007   Used to load, look up and store all references in a single cell.
00008 
00009   Depends on esm/loadcell.hpp (loading from ESM) and esm_store.hpp
00010   (looking up references.) Neither of these modules depend on us.
00011  */
00012 
00013 #include "store.hpp"
00014 #include "components/esm/records.hpp"
00015 #include "components/esm/loadcell.hpp"
00016 #include <list>
00017 
00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include <stdexcept>
00020 
00021 namespace ESMS
00022 {
00023   using namespace ESM;
00024 
00026   template <typename X, typename D>
00027   struct LiveCellRef
00028   {
00029     // The object that this instance is based on.
00030     const X* base;
00031 
00032     /* Information about this instance, such as 3D location and
00033        rotation and individual type-dependent data.
00034     */
00035     CellRef ref;
00036 
00038     D mData;
00039   };
00040 
00042   template <typename X, typename D>
00043   struct CellRefList
00044   {
00045     typedef LiveCellRef<X, D> LiveRef;
00046     typedef std::list<LiveRef> List;
00047     List list;
00048 
00049     // Search for the given reference in the given reclist from
00050     // ESMStore. Insert the reference into the list if a match is
00051     // found. If not, throw an exception.
00052     template <typename Y>
00053     void find(CellRef &ref, const Y& recList)
00054     {
00055       const X* obj = recList.find(ref.refID);
00056       if(obj == NULL)
00057         throw std::runtime_error("Error resolving cell reference " + ref.refID);
00058 
00059       LiveRef lr;
00060       lr.ref = ref;
00061       lr.base = obj;
00062 
00063       list.push_back(lr);
00064     }
00065 
00066     LiveRef *find (const std::string& name)
00067     {
00068         for (typename std::list<LiveRef>::iterator iter (list.begin()); iter!=list.end(); ++iter)
00069         {
00070             if (iter->ref.refID==name)
00071                 return &*iter;
00072         }
00073 
00074         return 0;
00075     }
00076   };
00077 
00079   template <typename D>
00080   class CellStore
00081   {
00082   public:
00083     CellStore() : cell (0) {}
00084 
00085     const ESM::Cell *cell;
00086 
00087     // Lists for each individual object type
00088     CellRefList<Activator, D>         activators;
00089     CellRefList<Potion, D>            potions;
00090     CellRefList<Apparatus, D>         appas;
00091     CellRefList<Armor, D>             armors;
00092     CellRefList<Book, D>              books;
00093     CellRefList<Clothing, D>          clothes;
00094     CellRefList<Container, D>         containers;
00095     CellRefList<Creature, D>          creatures;
00096     CellRefList<Door, D>              doors;
00097     CellRefList<Ingredient, D>        ingreds;
00098     CellRefList<CreatureLevList, D>   creatureLists;
00099     CellRefList<ItemLevList, D>       itemLists;
00100     CellRefList<ESM::Light, D>        lights;
00101     CellRefList<Tool, D>              lockpicks;
00102     CellRefList<Misc, D>              miscItems;
00103     CellRefList<NPC, D>               npcs;
00104     CellRefList<Probe, D>             probes;
00105     CellRefList<Repair, D>            repairs;
00106     CellRefList<Static, D>            statics;
00107     CellRefList<Weapon, D>            weapons;
00108 
00111     void loadInt(const std::string &name, const ESMStore &store, ESMReader &esm)
00112     {
00113         std::cout << "loading cell '" << name << "'\n";
00114 
00115         cell = store.cells.findInt(name);
00116 
00117         if(cell == NULL)
00118             throw std::runtime_error("Cell not found - " + name);
00119 
00120         loadRefs(store, esm);
00121     }
00122 
00124     void loadExt(int X, int Y, const ESMStore &store, ESMReader &esm)
00125     {
00126         std::cout << "loading exterior cell '" << X << ", " << Y << "'\n";
00127 
00128         cell = store.cells.searchExt (X, Y);
00129 
00130         if(cell == NULL)
00131             throw std::runtime_error("Exterior cell not found");
00132 
00133         loadRefs(store, esm);
00134     }
00135 
00136   private:
00137     void loadRefs(const ESMStore &store, ESMReader &esm)
00138     {
00139       assert (cell);
00140 
00141       // Reopen the ESM reader and seek to the right position.
00142       cell->restore(esm);
00143 
00144       CellRef ref;
00145 
00146       // Get each reference in turn
00147       while(cell->getNextRef(esm, ref))
00148         {
00149           int rec = store.find(ref.refID);
00150 
00151           /* We can optimize this further by storing the pointer to the
00152              record itself in store.all, so that we don't need to look it
00153              up again here. However, never optimize. There are infinite
00154              opportunities to do that later.
00155            */
00156           switch(rec)
00157             {
00158             case REC_ACTI: activators.find(ref, store.activators); break;
00159             case REC_ALCH: potions.find(ref, store.potions); break;
00160             case REC_APPA: appas.find(ref, store.appas); break;
00161             case REC_ARMO: armors.find(ref, store.armors); break;
00162             case REC_BOOK: books.find(ref, store.books); break;
00163             case REC_CLOT: clothes.find(ref, store.clothes); break;
00164             case REC_CONT: containers.find(ref, store.containers); break;
00165             case REC_CREA: creatures.find(ref, store.creatures); break;
00166             case REC_DOOR: doors.find(ref, store.doors); break;
00167             case REC_INGR: ingreds.find(ref, store.ingreds); break;
00168             case REC_LEVC: creatureLists.find(ref, store.creatureLists); break;
00169             case REC_LEVI: itemLists.find(ref, store.itemLists); break;
00170             case REC_LIGH: lights.find(ref, store.lights); break;
00171             case REC_LOCK: lockpicks.find(ref, store.lockpicks); break;
00172             case REC_MISC: miscItems.find(ref, store.miscItems); break;
00173             case REC_NPC_: npcs.find(ref, store.npcs); break;
00174             case REC_PROB: probes.find(ref, store.probes); break;
00175             case REC_REPA: repairs.find(ref, store.repairs); break;
00176             case REC_STAT: statics.find(ref, store.statics); break;
00177             case REC_WEAP: weapons.find(ref, store.weapons); break;
00178 
00179             case 0: std::cout << "Cell reference " + ref.refID + " not found!\n"; break;
00180             default:
00181               std::cout << "WARNING: Ignoring reference '" << ref.refID << "' of unhandled type\n";
00182             }
00183         }
00184     }
00185 
00186   };
00187 }
